titles.title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to apply to Hispanic-serving institutions of higher education the same student loan default rate limitations applicable to historically Black colleges and universities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning.

committee.name: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities

committee.subcommittee: Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning
committee.name: House Economic and Educational Opportunities

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to apply to Hispanic-serving institutions of higher education the same student loan default rate limitations applicable to historically Black colleges and universities.
